description:
Neil Nitin Mukesh has reportedly grabbed a role in Season 6 of Game of Thrones.据报道，男星Neil Nitin Mukesh将会加入《权力的游戏》第六季。

Mukesh told the Times of India that he got the role through Greg Powell, who was the action director on Mukesh’s recent film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. Powell has worked on films like Avengers: Age of Ultron, Fast and Furious 6, and Harry Potter, and is also the stunt director for Game of Thrones. It was Powell who Mukesh says offered him the role.在和印度时报记者采访中，穆科什对自己最近的电影《Prem Ratan Dhan Payo》的武术指导格雷戈·鲍威尔表示感谢，这次参演也是通过他才又获得了机会。鲍威尔之前曾参与过《复仇者联盟：奥创纪元》，《速度与激情》第六部和《哈利波特》等作品的拍摄工作，同时也是《权力的游戏》的特技指导。

"Greg has directed two sword-fighting sequences in PRDP for which I had to train for over a month in order to get the stance and wrist movements right. He seemed pretty impressed with all the hard work I put in and made the offer when we were shooting for the climax scene a few months ago."穆科什补充说：“格雷戈在《Prem Ratan Dhan Payo》电影中指导了两场武器格斗的拍摄，为了准备该场拍摄，我不得不在一个月内加强训练，让自己的站姿和手腕的灵活程度符合拍摄的要求。他对我的认真表示很欣赏，在一个月之前拍摄电影高潮片段的时候，他便向我提出了参演《权力的游戏》的机会。”

Mukesh says he is a huge Game of Thrones fan, and that he’ll be playing a character similar to his character from Prem Ratan Dhan Payo, in that both characters are royal and involved in combat.穆科什透露自己是一名忠实的《权力的游戏》的粉丝，并表示将在第六季出演的角色跟自己在《Prem Ratan Dhan Payo》饰演的角色很相似，他们都很忠臣，在战场上也很奋力。

HBO has not confirmed Mukesh’s casting. If true, he may be playing another members of House Martell, the royal house of Dorne that was introduced in Season 5.HBO官方目前还没有公布关于穆课什的角色信息，极大的可能性是他将饰演第五季出现的多恩王国马泰尔家族的一员。
